price: 69. Ne vois-tu pas comment ceux qui disputent au sujet de Nos Signes se font fourvoyer ?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أَنَّىٰ يُصۡرَفُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyāti al-lahi annā yuṣ'rafūna
